nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hello Dr Person1, I have a visit scheduled with you on MM/DD/YYYY which I would like to have moved to MM/DD/YYYY. I am already scheduled to meet with Dr  Person2 on the MM/DD/YYYY @10:30 so if your office can scheduled a visit for the MM/DD/YYYY at the appropriate time to accommodate my 10:30 meeting with Dr  Person2 I would be able to make only one trip to Org4 and see you both on the same day.
